name: The Phoros project
tagline: Sources for the study of Athenian tribute
body:
# Phoros: sources for the study of Athenian tribute

Github repositories for this project:

- [phoros](https://github.com/phoros/phoros): archival data and editions of texts
- [phorosservlet](https://github.com/phoros/phorosservlet): a servlet for working with the phoros archive

Other resources:

- archive of freely licensed [images available for download](http://shot.holycross.edu/phoros-image-archive)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
